definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: We won't have Nesta, Dida, Serginho or Favalli until after the break, Gattuso is recovering well and could be back before the break.
sentences.chinese: 而加图索也在很快的恢复，他也将在冬歇期过后归队。

sentences.english: It need quite a long time return to the former stability after rain, 5.
sentences.chinese: 降雨过后相当长时间，滑坡才能恢复到雨前的稳定性。

sentences.english: There is a raise after three months probation period according to your performance.
sentences.chinese: 三个月的试用期过后，将根据工作表现加薪。

sentences.english: Minshan thousands more hi snow, after the three services do Kai-yan.
sentences.chinese: 更喜岷山千里雪，三军过后尽开颜。

sentences.english: You may have heard terms like rear axle ratio or final drive ratio.
sentences.chinese: 你可能已经学过后桥减速比或主减速比。

sentences.english: Soon after this conversation, Haggis and Diane Gettas got married.
sentences.chinese: 这一番谈话过后不久，哈吉斯和黛安就结婚了。

sentences.english: Unintentionally Zhang Jie from the radio to hear that the first "after tomorrow."
sentences.chinese: 无意间从收音机里听到张杰的那首《明天过后》。

sentences.english: Maybe after the next round of league, there would have been north of Nanjing Institute of beyond.
sentences.chinese: 或许下轮联赛过后，南京有有就将被北理工超越。

sentences.english: We had to calm the children down after the excitement.
sentences.chinese: 兴奋过后，我们必须让孩子冷静下来。

sentences.english: We got loaded onto a bus after a modest delay.
sentences.chinese: 谦逊的晚点过后，我们上了一辆公共汽车。

sentences.english: A few days after Christmas, my six year sonI were talking.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节过后的一天，六岁的儿子和我在聊天。

sentences.english: After the joke, it's just a sad.
sentences.chinese: 玩笑过后，只是一途伤感。

sentences.english: The price of vegetables keeped increasing after the typhoon.
sentences.chinese: 台风过后蔬菜价格持续上涨。

sentences.english: The peach trees cast all their blossoms after the heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 大雨过后，桃花全部落掉。

sentences.english: Villagers gather outside a house whose walls cracked from an earthquake in Jalpaiguri, West Bengal.
sentences.chinese: 地震过后，村民们聚在一所遭损伤房屋的窗外。

definition: to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
to wait until/by the time when (sth is ready etc)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
